column1: It appears that the Petitioner- Respondent-Appellant- Petitioner [hereinafter sometimes referred to
as the Petitioner] in this Application invoked the Jurisdiction of the Magistrate’s Court of Wattala,
in terms of Section 66(1) (b) of the Primary Courts’ Procedure Act by way of a Private Plaint and
instituted Action bearing No. 18463 against the Respondent-Petitioner- Respondent- Respondent
